QuestData.Title: Earned Reverence
QuestData.CompletionText: I must know, $n. When you look directly into the eyes of the enemy, do you see fear? Do they now cower in your presence? They must realize that they are defeated!$B$BYou have earned reverence among the Guard. Present your insignia!
QuestData.RewardText: When we first met, I would have never guessed that a hero was in the making. Carry on, soldier!
